General.Name: Daidong Elec
General.Description: Daidong Electronics Co. Ltd. engages in mold design and manufacturing, and technical development activities in Korea and internationally. The company design, manufactures, fits, and assembles molds. It also manufactures various injection molding products, such as small ultra-precision engineering plastic injection, big and small parts of various electronic, automobile, double-colored injection, micropore formation, gas injection molding, and in-mold injection products. In addition, the company provides NC machine, wire cut, EDM, injection, die spoiting, and laser machine equipment. Daidong Electronics Co. Ltd. was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
